title: House for Sale in Colombo 05
details:
Highly Residential Property in Kirulapana (Sri Siddhartha Road)

House built in 20 perches of land consisting 3 Bed Room and 2 Bath Rooms,(one room with attached bath room & 2 bed room with common bath room) 3 Car Parking, large hall, large dinning Pantry, Servant room, toilets, driver room, Store room & garden space

Located in calm and quiet, decent residential area

Price Rs. 120 Million (negotiable)

Please call for more information

Exclusively sold by -

PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD
351 ,DUPLICATION ROAD , (next to mahanama college )
COLOMBO 03
